text: @realDonaldTrump With the coronavirus epidemic affecting poor and rich people alike, Americans are starting to learn that universal healthcare like Bernie Sanders’ Medicare For All is necessary for our country’s basic survival. The only way to fight pandemics is to take care of everyone equally.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
